title: The display property set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not become invisible as expected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Add a label to the PDF.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF and observe that the label is still visible.
